title: The January 6th Hearings: #4 (6/21/22) full hearing
description: The Select Committee to Investigate the January 6th Attack on the United States Capitol holds the fourth in a series of hearings to share the findings of their investigation with the American public. This is the fourth hearing in its entirety.
author: multimedia@msnbc.com (MSNBC)
content:encoded: The Select Committee to Investigate the January 6th Attack on the United States Capitol holds the fourth in a series of hearings to share the findings of their investigation with the American public. This is the fourth hearing in its entirety.
